message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll counteroffer at $110. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I'm still not sure if $110 is within my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from your counteroffer. I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get closer to a deal. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good value for the product. I'll counteroffer at $105. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
